Sylvan Esso – “Coffee (J. Rocc Remix)”

posted by Confusion on October 28, 2014 in Audio
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of

Sylvan Esso’s “Coffee” has been in heavy rotation since January, but it still doesn’t feel played out. It’s catchy as hell, but it’s a subtle kind of catchy, not an in-your-face, obnoxious kind. For this remix, J. Rocc gives it a little extra thump, adding some muscle to this gentle hit for an instant pick-me-up. Sylvan Esso’s self-titled debut album is out now, and they’ve just announced a big world tour for 2015. Check out dates below.

From J. Rocc: “Turn this up and let the vibe come through. No doobie in this funk! Make sure you’re ready. Here we go!! Pigeons & Planes, remix to make ya bounce.”

Watch the music video for the original below:
